reviewSnippet.question: What are people saying about attractions in Novi, MI?
reviewSnippet.answerPrompt: This is a review for attractions in Novi, MI:

answer.text: "Hired a charter for a company event. The staff was easy to work with and had fast response time. We also had a last minute change and The Detroit Bus Company was quick to help and make some major adjustments. Jessica killed it on the office side and Calvin killed it as our tour guide. We did a Welcome to Detroit tour and it was fun and informative. Calvin showed us some of the new, old and all the major attractions. Our group had a great time.  Many thanks!! K"
answer.ctaText: See more reviews for this business.

answer.text: "Paid for my ticket with my card. Went to the concession stand card couldn't read, employee said "I dont know" after about 30nsec of silence and offered another afterwards in terms of a solution. Before the movie started (and after it was supposed to start) we watched a blank screen that said active desktop recovery. Watched a movie in an uncomfortable seat with no snacks or drinks, gots say least enjoyable experience at a movie theater ever, will not be returning."
answer.ctaText: See more reviews for this business.

reviewSnippet.answerPrompt: This is a review for attractions in Novi, MI:

answer.text: "Talk about the best customer service, this place is the best. Unfortunately they did not have the wheelchair accessible ramp I needed, but instead of just saying no, Beth offered to help me find one. She looked around online and called me back! How awesome is that! Customer service is key to any business. I will definitely use this business and recommend it to others!  Thank you Beth! It's great to know that people like you still exist! Have a great day! -Donna"
answer.ctaText: See more reviews for this business.
